Hire Workers

By the Hour

Hire experienced and hardworking manual day laborers and pay them securely by Credit Card through Joe's Amigos app.

GPS Connect

Locate and review the closest and most experienced day laborers eager to get to work by GPS.

On Demand Labor

Whether a few hours or a few weeks.  Read reviews and hire workers for general manual labor or with specialized trade skills to complete projects involving carpentry, landscaping, plumbing, masonry or others.

Additional Features

Job Clock Tracking

Payment Processing

Auto Message Translator

A built in stop clock will track your worker's job shift down to the second.  Avoid disputes with workers over start time and avoid paying for excess labor time due to rounding up.

When you need 4 workers to rake leaves for a full day it can be a lot of cash to carry around.  Avoid the risks of carrying around too much cash with the Joe's Amigos payment transfer and pay for their labor with credit card.


Language barriers and communication challenges that exist with hiring spanish speaking workers is solved.  We provide an easy to use text messaging service that will automatically convert your english messages into spanish for your worker and vice versa.

Job Clock Tracking

A built in stop clock will track your worker's job shift down to the second.  Avoid disputes with workers over start time and avoid paying for excess labor time due to rounding up.

Payment Processing

When you need 4 workers to rake leaves for a full day it can be a lot of cash to carry around.  Avoid the risks of carrying around too much cash with the Joe's Amigos payment transfer and pay for their labor with credit card.


Auto Message Translator

Language barriers and communication challenges that exist with hiring spanish speaking workers is solved.  We provide an easy to use text messaging service that will automatically convert your english messages into spanish for your worker and vice versa.
